TMDB staff are awful and spreads lies.

name: The Staff here are F**king Clueless
original_name: The Staff here are F**king Clueless
overview: The TMDB Staff don't know anything and use lies and untruths when putting in information about a show, no matter which show it is, they will make it an american production, even if there is no american production on the show at all. They don't understand the difference between Distributors of Shows and Production companies. they just lock any info they have entered so nobody can change it to the TRUTH. The site is absolutely useless, as are the xenophobic staff and their minions.

production_companies.name: American Company Who Didnt Produce This
